website_summaries.verdict: With 6 spray modes, an anti-clog feature, and a price that won't break the bank, this is a great solution from WaterPik.
pros: Technology enables it to channel even low-pressure water flow for a more satisfying shower
cons: Some who owned a previous model from WaterPik feel the quality has declined slightly

customer_reviews.title: Not your father's Waterpik
customer_reviews.text: Few useful spray options. Yes, lots of "pulsating" spray options, but no single decent "wash-shampoo-out-of-your-hair" spray option. And I could NOT get a tight seal with the connector to the wall pipe (and this was true with two different wall pipes, and with plumber's tape, so I can only put it up to a manufacturing defect in the connector). It's not nearly as good as my previous (15-year old) Waterpik unit. Of course the current item is made in China - go figure!
customer_reviews.author: John S. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Ain't worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in August 2018 and now May 5 the damn thing is broke. Sure don't make things good anymore. Very disappointed in workmanship of this one...cheap quality. Will not buy another one or recommend it either. Ain't worth the money they charge for it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Branum

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the best Waterpik I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the best Waterpik I have owned, but for the price it is fine. We bought this to hold us over for a year until we remodel the master bath so we were being pretty cheap when we ordered it, and it is what it is. No leaks, no issues, just not a luxury shower head by any means. Worth the money spent, but definitely made cheaply compared to the old white one we had for years (15 years before it began to leak) so this one will hold us over but the pressure is not great and the feel is a bit plastic-like.
customer_reviews.author: DontSayCant

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this waterpick shower head. I've had bad luck with the last few shower heads I've purchased from multiple companies as they all seem to be cheaply made. This has worked great so far. No problems with installation No leaks. The cord length is good. It's easy to adjust. One caveat was that it sits a little taller than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Holt

customer_reviews.title: CHROME FINISHED PLASTIC DOESN'T HOLD UP
customer_reviews.text: Worked for awhile but as soon as I opened it I knew it wasn't going to last long. Note that it is packaged such that you'll destroy the packaging getting it open. As soon as I saw that the hose fitting (threaded to attach to your shower pipe) was PLASTIC I was disappointed. Well, it snapped off at that point yesterday and there is no fix. It was also somewhat difficult to get the handheld out of the bracket. Believe this is why it snapped off just above this point.
customer_reviews.author: rmoore

customer_reviews.title: get you wet
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed at all, my last one was 12 years old, worked well till it started to leak, this replacement has no pressure and not sure if it will last long, it feels cheap as well as having no weight to it. ...
customer_reviews.author: 1 Sweet Ol Bear

customer_reviews.title: Functions well but not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The installation is quite simple and functions well however the quality particularly the hose between the water pipe to the handle is not of good quality. I've replaced the hose twice in 1 year because its just cheap plastic which wears out easily resulting in holes in the waterline (hose).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good product but change the hose.
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the massage swing was very weak at first. I needed a longer hose so I got a stainless steel one on Amazon. It instantly improved my water pressure now the massage setting works fine. Also, once you change the hose you'll probably need a different showerhead holder for a secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Witalis007

customer_reviews.title: Shower Head Mount is High; Hose is Stiff & Unyielding (at least initially)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Waterpik® Model No. NSL 653 to replace a 37 year old Waterpik® Shower Massage and was initially disappointed. The position of the shower head is too high and the model does not come with an extension clip as indicated in the Instruction Manual for some models. I emailed Waterpik® and within less than 24 hours I received notice a clip to lower the shower head is in the mail. The hose is quite stiff and unyielding so that it will not hang smoothly. Perhaps it will become more limber in time.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead, plenty of pressure
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace showerhead in secondary bath, as I had knee replacement surgery requiring "sit-down" showers when I got home from surgery/rehab. Did a lot of looking on Amazon before picking this model, which turned out to be a great choice. Several different settings to satisfy any need (soft shower mode to hard spray, etc.) Good length on the hose, which enabled me to shower easily without reaching too far to get hold of the showerhead itself (while seated.) Replaced a less than satisfactory stationary shower head. Good quality, very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefjjb

customer_reviews.title: Plastic portion behind the swivel area broke
customer_reviews.text: 5 months after I purchased this from Amazon and the shower head broke. I've never had a shower head break on me before. The plastic portion behind where it swivels just tore and water came shooting out of it. It is completely unusable now. Amazon's return window is 1 month so I am past the window. They don't pay for shipping after 1 month and only give a partial refund. So for $30 it isn't worth returning. I won't be buying a Waterpik to replace this. It worked great and had awesome water pressure before it broke. But then the plastic portion gave way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one first.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for - a nice shower setting and a strong concentrated jet spray setting. Had bought another brand but that did not deliver the strong spay that we were looking for. Well worth spending the money for a second device to get what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Nothing comes out of the 3 holes in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Its an OK showerhead. One thing that disappointed me is it makes it look like there are 3 holes in the middle. But they serve no use because no water comes out of those 3 holes
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great water pressure
customer_reviews.text: I have low pressure and live in the desert. I never expected the raise in pressure with this product. I love it. I can now wash my thick hair and be out of the shower in no time. The last one I had was pathetic, almost useless. This one has made my showering pleasurable. The only complaint is that it is almost all plastic and I fear that it won't hold up very long. Years ago, in another house, I had one and it was made of metal. It was wonderful. I only wish I had taken it with me!
customer_reviews.author: Pat S

customer_reviews.title: Cut your shower time in half
customer_reviews.text: Remove the water saver screen. It's easy. Use the three center jets and cut your shower time in half. Power Washer.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Wash the dog....
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same as my flexible neck unit, except now I can wash the dog.
customer_reviews.author: BUGZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a lousy product - while we do have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lousy product - while we do have low water pressure (city water), our last shower head (which we bought a couple years ago) worked really well until, alass, it was dropped one to many times and the screw insert for the hose broke off the handheld showerhead. This shower head barely has enough pressure to make it a couple inches from the head.
customer_reviews.author: William S Harn

customer_reviews.title: Waterpik Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: I have had this same shower head for over 10 years. I always keep an extra one in stock. I could not find any at my store so I was very happy to find them online. I also gave my son, daughter, mom and sister one and they all love it. It does not spray all over and get everything wet. You can control where you want the water to go. I have two extra ones and I am planning on buying more before this shower head goes obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: All plastic. Very cheap. And the flow is horrible compared to my previous shower head.
customer_reviews.author: ccrider

customer_reviews.title: Water pik is the best
customer_reviews.text: Have one like this and purchased this for a new house!
customer_reviews.author: Don bacheson

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: plastic, unlike the good ole shower pic unit. would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Spa in your Shower for under 40 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Waterpik is the leader in shower-head technology. This model is great for homes with low water pressure. The body is made of plastic covered in a silver finish that mimics chrome, so it is light (great for younger/older users). The hose is 5 feet long, and the showerhead has 6 settings, although only 4 are different (2 are just "stronger"). I love my Waterpik, and I got it 2 days after I ordered. Really a great gift for yourself, or anyone who can't get to a spa but wants to pamper themselves.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Good showerhead, not sure about the hose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handheld showerhead to replace a Waterpik showerhead that I had owned for over 20 years. It seems to be working just as well. My only concern is the "Faux Metal Hose". It is not very flexible. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: JJN4mLA

customer_reviews.title: Great shower experience with this involved.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, this shower head is as described by the manufacturer. The old shower head I suspect will take longer to remove than the new one will require to install. My wife is pleased, which in turn makes me very happy. I like all the flow settings however I suspect most people will be like us and find a favorite and set it there by default.
customer_reviews.author: J.F. LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: A good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to set to the strength desired.
customer_reviews.author: Simone de Beauvoir

customer_reviews.title: nice shower for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the original waterpick (some 15yrs old or so) and like the spray alot better...we have hard water and it feels softer, not pins and needles. The power spray is good for concentrated washing. I like it, but I have only owned waterpick. Don't waste yout time and money on the 5 mode even if you don't need the power spray. It is smaller and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Best you can Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best showhead you can buy. It has 6 different adjustments of flow and gets you cleaner than a regular showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: btb65

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Nice strong water flow pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I had previous bought a combo rainfall shower head combo (another manufacturer), but found it to be very weak. I bought this to replace the hand held sprayer. Unfortunately it is not the same manufacturer, however fit okay and solved my problem. I now have a shower massage, with strong water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water pressure
customer_reviews.text: We like that this shower head passes enough water to give a good pulse. All of the settings on this item work well.
customer_reviews.author: Suzski

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Matches the description and photo. Easy to install, works fine. Removed the flow restrictor, no problem. The hose straightens out somewhat if you run hot water thru it and then leave it hanging down for a day. It's a little snug in the wall bracket. I like the choice of settings.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwater Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does what's advertised. Just wish they would go back to metal fittings. I've owned Waterpik shower heads for decades and they work and last but I've had two break at the pipe fittings because of the plastics. I have one that lasted for 15 years, it's metal. Be that as it may, I recommend that you should buy Waterpik. Best, in my opinion, plastic or not.
customer_reviews.author: 11bboogie

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother after visiting her and seeing that her shower head had become a trickle. It was a pretty amazing difference, and she is very psyched about it. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All PLASTIC!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Come on people, the hole thing is PLASTIC. Even the plumbing conection is PLASTIC. Don't look for this shower head to last like Waterpik fixtures have in the past. Just cheap. What a shame they cheapened their product like this. Will never buy another Waterpic handheld shower again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The hose is nice and supple (though I DO recommend letting it hang ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the Waterpik NSL 653 so far. It's performing exactly as I was hoping. The hose is nice and supple (though I DO recommend letting it hang down to keep it that way). The unit is attractive. It was a snap to install. It's a big relief after my last over-the-hill shower head. Time will tell if this one has any staying power. But I'm optimistic!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Save water and not even notice what's missing.
customer_reviews.text: This shower head creates the illusion of much greater water pressure that you would normally feel with such a low flow and water usage. It is nice to take a long shower and not be ankle deep in water from my aging plumbing. The hose relaxes after a few weeks and gains flexibility. No complaints although I have another model of the same brand without a handle that has a better massage effect then this model. Still a great shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Bisson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower for the money
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several of the Waterpik shower heads and this one gives the most satisfying showers of the bunch, in our opinion. There are no worthless settings--like misting--on this one. And it's the first model that has settings that satisfy all members of the family--both those who like a gentle rain, and those who like a blasting shower. And we've had no complaints about the pressure on any of the settings, even though the flow-limiter is in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The water pressure from this handheld shower is fantastic. The best water pressure results from all shower heads i have experienced in my 41 years of bathing...Honestly ! Waterpik is now my choice of brands going forward. Sincerely, Me.
customer_reviews.author: Obiedawg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent handheld shower
customer_reviews.text: This handheld shower has an excellent variety of spray settings and works well even without great water pressure. I've tried other brands that did not work well. Waterpik makes the best handheld shower heads. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Off The Beaten Path

customer_reviews.title: I don't think my belly button has ever been better!
customer_reviews.text: This rocks, power blast your naughty parts on your special nights. Lol, but seriously, I don't think my belly button has ever been better!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom to replace her wall mounted shower head. Got a chance to use it while at 'home' on vacation, what a difference in her shower!! The chrome is stylish, the pulse strong, and the hose is of sufficient length. I've had a water pik handheld in my shower for years, this model has convinced me it's time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: KathyZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the massage settings and the long hose to reach everywhere to get extra clean
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Absolute crap
customer_reviews.text: Worst showerhead I have ever owned. Hose is not plyable. Bracket and hose connections keep leaking. Bracket is too tight for hose to easily fit through. This makes it anoying to remove and return hand held to bracket. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARK M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I like this shower head, especially compared to a standard head. I like the hose and it is just about long enough. We were able to find a spray adjustment we both like. Could have been five stars but I don't have much to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Reader

customer_reviews.title: Hand held shower head
customer_reviews.text: This is great. We have been using it for 2 years now and it has been great. We live the multiple settings.
customer_reviews.author: Irishyone

customer_reviews.title: the flow is far better. Very simple to pop out the restrictors
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a far more expensive Moen with this piece, and while it does not look as elegant as the Moen, the flow is far better. Very simple to pop out the restrictors.
customer_reviews.author: GRC

customer_reviews.title: OK - I have had better waterpiks
customer_reviews.text: Just ok - I took out the water restriction piece and still get average flow. There is no shutoff either, so if you want that option - move on.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper D

customer_reviews.title: Under Pressured
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and tried it out for a few weeks. Had to stick it in the kid's shower because there just wasn't enough pressure. I bought a different brand who's name is synonymous with change and I got all the pressure back and more.
customer_reviews.author: Major_Zero

customer_reviews.title: Missing required parts.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions tell you to take the washer from the prior shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Mack W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Its ok But
customer_reviews.text: I have had handheld showers in the past but this one is kinda off , its not as good as my old one (same Brand) its had to take off and put back on hook , the cord id to big and you have to push it threw hole/clamp i wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Sal Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Paint Peels Inside Bracket that Connects to Hose and Comes Through Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the bracket that connects the hose to the wall is lined with a cheap silver shiny coating, so i discovered. That inner silver shiny coating started peeling off into tiny pieces about 8 months after I installed this. It came out through the shower head when the water was turned on. I verified this by removing the bracket and looked inside the bracket and saw the silver shiny coating peeling and chipped. I can no longer use that bracket. Very unsafe and not to mention gross. I called Waterpik and sent the toxic specimen to them in exchange for a different new bracket at zero cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: crunchytone

customer_reviews.title: It worked but the spray was not a strong as ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked but the spray was not a strong as the less expensive one that I had before. I preferred the cheaper or older version.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Shower head with hose
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small mobile home and am 6" tall. The tub/shower was set at about 5"6" and I always had to duck to get my hair wet. Now I can stand under shower head and remove to use hose when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: SusanSchaefer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love, LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Any and every spray pattern you could want, from very gentle to stingy sharp. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Trekincat

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as advertised and works very well! Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for another unit that was OK but getting shabby. This hand shower outshines my other one by far. It has more adjustments and better control. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harry F. Drabik

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them. Just as described. Very easy to install. No leaks. Great water pressure and love the six different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Not as much water pressure as I was hoping for ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as much water pressure as I was hoping for. We took out the restrictor but that only helped a little.
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. Especially the high pressure spray. I injured my arm and this makes it easy to take a shower :)
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made out of cheap plastic and you can't even screw it into the faucet without scratching it. Promptly returned.
customer_reviews.author: A. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new shower head.
customer_reviews.text: After some research and desiring to avoid low flow and desiring multiple options, chose this head. It works great and has everything I wanted. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Centexfam

customer_reviews.title: This is a $60+ head in....
customer_reviews.text: ... The big box stores. No tephlon tapes needed with the included rubber washer, even with the water saver this head puts out great pressure! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: excellent budget handheld shower
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, looks good, works great, and you can't beat the price. Plus, you can order replacement parts if you need them. I haven't had the need, but it's nice to know that you can.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie G

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head.
customer_reviews.text: We like the different options of this head and the power is much better than our previous one. Sometimes you need pressure to get in there nice and deep like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice massage
customer_reviews.text: It's great to get a little massage each time I shower. I originally bought this for my husband's bathroom but I liked it so much I also bought one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Still working great
customer_reviews.text: Bought another one of these awhile ago. Don't know why I waiting so long to replace the original one in the other bath...maybe because I don't use that bathroom??
customer_reviews.author: John Sindelar

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had a Chrome Hansgrohe Aktiva A8 Hand Shower Chrome which just broke. I bought this as a substitute. No where as close for a showering experience. I remember using a Waterpik shower head when I was a kid, but this doesn't bring back the same memories.
customer_reviews.author: Pat MD

customer_reviews.title: Good shower head
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install . Seems to be good quality. And the sprays selection is easy to turn.. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Russo

customer_reviews.title: Happy to shower again.
customer_reviews.text: My old shower head was so bad it was hard to rinse off! This one went in easy and has so many different heads on it. We have low pressure and this one works well. It is good to shower now!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Covert

customer_reviews.title: great shower head
customer_reviews.text: I COULD NOT BELIVE HOW WELL THIS SHOWER HEAD WORKS , BEST I'VE EVER HAD THE WATER PRESSURE IS UNBELIVEABLE. IF I EVER NEED ANOTHER REPLACEMENT THIS WILL BE IT !!
customer_reviews.author: Earl J. Byard

customer_reviews.title: Power sray
customer_reviews.text: We love this one. Tit has great pressure when the required pressure reducer is removed. I would highly recommend. Easy to install also.
customer_reviews.author: Imperial Girl

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these based on other reviews, but when I got them, they were cheap plastic and I could not tighten the fitting without breaking the plastic--and it leaked! The picture made it look like it had chrome pipe connections, but it didn't. I can't even speak to the shower settings because it leaked so much, we had to take it down and put up the old shower head again. At least the Amazon return process was really, really easy and efficient! I ended up going to Lowe's and buying Moen handheld showers. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this waterpik to replace my old one that finally gave out and sprayed more out of the handle than the shower head. This new one works great and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Horsmon

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Works great, does what it should, no leaks, no problems, what more could you ask for from a hand held shower head.
customer_reviews.author: shannonnn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well but would have liked a bit more pressure from massage setting
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my girls bathroom they like it and says it work great for them..
customer_reviews.author: G Pope

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying twice
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this in my first apartment and I was too lazy to take it with me when I moved so I just bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rasmussen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the variations I can dial easily with the shower head. Exactly what I wanted, and it has a nice heft.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ulvang

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Has the Waterpik quality. Easy to install. Works well. Does not leak. Has a variety of spray options meeting any need.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected. Reeeaally didn' tlike that it was delivered by being left at the door step of my apartment complex.
customer_reviews.author: Lordmistress

customer_reviews.title: happy pregnant lady
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I went with this item. It has perfect water pressure. Was easy to install. Only negative was it didn't come with the sealing tape. Otherwise item is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, could not have ask for anything better. It works perfectly, and you get a very relaxing shower experience from it.
customer_reviews.author: Kutegirl

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: the price is right easy to install ,hand tighten, pressure good varuous setting easy to regulate a connector is in the pack but instructions dont tell u what its for and u dont need it
customer_reviews.author: MG fresh meadows

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for years and was unable to find what I wanted in the stores. Alas! here it is.....perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: waterpik detachable shower
customer_reviews.text: this item came very quickly...was packaged nicely and works as well or better than expected! i am very happy with product and with seller.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Waterpik NSL 653 Linea 6-Mode Handheld Shower, Chrome
customer_reviews.text: Might be a little on the low quality side, but serves the purpose for the money. Looks nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Stated
customer_reviews.text: Product works as described. Water pressure is not as strong as the last one I owned but I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best pressure
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best shower head. I looked and looked for the best pressure for a handheld and this one is better than even the standard showerhead. If you want strong water pressure, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Smell of plastic
customer_reviews.text: This product has a strong smell of plastic and feels kind of flimsy, but so far I cannot complain about anything else. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Johanne

customer_reviews.title: Great For Low Water Pressure
customer_reviews.text: If you have low water pressure but like a strong water flow in the shower this is the shower-head for you. Unlike other shower-heads, the force of the water flow is very strong for the various settings. It is a joy again to take a shower!!!! One note: The directions state that you do not need to seal the fittings with teflon tape to prevent leakage. No big deal, but I did need to use teflon tape. You may or may not need the teflon tape depending on your plumbing.
customer_reviews.author: Don Richards

customer_reviews.title: andheld Waterpik Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: The waterpik was an excellent choose. It is even better than I thought it would be. It was very easy to install and only took a few minutes. We think it is just great and would recommend it to anyone as a BEST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Zavada, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option
customer_reviews.text: It's plastic, and when unhooked it's hard to put it back into the original position. It wastes water through an unnecessary valve. When it's removed from the holder to be used at a lower level, for example to rinse something in the shower, there isn't enough pressure, so it's useless unless it's just for taking a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head / hose is junk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower head ! I would give it five stars if the hose that came with it wasn't junk .
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Weak Flow
customer_reviews.text: Even with the restrictor/filter removed, the water flow is very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Brad & Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and I must say they a real good very easy to hook up nice long hose def 5 stars buy this you will not be sorry

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...

customer_reviews.title: great shower head
customer_reviews.text: you may not need all the settings but for the settings that I use it works great. good price as well.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Really good spray and makes showers much ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Really good spray and makes showers much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: New shower head
customer_reviews.text: Love it....such an improvement over our previous one. Not very complicated or too many features to use!
customer_reviews.author: PegNYNY

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Our old shower head had begun to leak. We liked the brand, so we chose another Water pic. This one is better than the old one.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Best shower head in the house. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Waterpik NSL 653 Linea 6-Mode Handheld Shower, Chrome
product_meta.description: This premium 2.5 GPM PowerSpray+ Waterpik hand held shower head offers a contemporary take on the traditional shower head design. Featuring sleek and soft lines, it brings elegance to your shower and is perfect for a variety of styles, from traditional to modern.Engineered with Waterpik OptiFLOW technology, this shower head will invigorate your body from head to toe with more water force. Due to regulatory requirements related to replacement shower head flow rates, this model is not available for purchase by residents in the states of California or Colorado – and in New York City.
feature_bullets: 3-1/2-Inch Round Shower Head with a spray control ring
6 Mode Hand Held Shower head with 5' Faux Metal Hose
Spray modes: full body coverage, pulsating massage, concentrated center spray, full body/massage combination, full body/center spray combination, water saver
